name: 吳忠敏
objective: 本課程以個案研究和文獻探討方式讓學生了解總體經濟的環境（包括GDP、GNP、失業率、景氣循環、通貨膨脹、政府的財政政策和貨幣政策的規劃與制定、匯率制度、總合供給與需求等課題）。This course is to analyze the macroeconomic policy, international economy, business cycles, government policy, exchange rate and other macroeconomic-related issues. The course will be taught with case studies and journal literature. Group discussions are needed.
schedule:
週次　　單元
一　　Introduction
二　　The data of macroeconomics
三　　National income
四　　Money and inflation
五　　The open economy
六　　Unemployment
七　　Economic growth I
八　　Economic growth II
九　　Midterm exam
十　　Economic fluctuations
十一　　Aggregate demand
十二　　Aggregate supply
十三　　IS-LM model I
十四　　IS-LM model II
十五　　IS-LM model III
十六　　Macroeconomic policy
十七　　Macroeconomic policy
十八　　Final exam
